title: RG 1/144 Build Strike Gundam Full Package
product_description:
RG 1/144 Build Strike Gundam Full Package
Sei Iori's FP Build Strike Gundam Full Package gets a Real Grade release from Bandai, complete with a variety of weapons--the Build Booster, beam rifle, beam gun (combinable with the beam rifle), two beam sabers, and shield.  It also comes with extra hands to hold the weapons.
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B_237teBJoo/V_fK8JGNzNI/AAAAAAALHqU/00BJ0qkclb4XM-3X5oIZkF3e9yNQRyqVACLcB/s1600/201610072239272fd.png

title: RG 1/144 00 Qan[T]
product_description:
To recreate the GN Drive docking and the GN Shield's range of movement as seen in the Gundam 00 movie, "Awakening of the Trailblazer", a series of mechanical mounts and swinging joints have been utilized
Frame features special modifications to allow the wrist to run parallel with the arm so the sword can be held horizontally
All weapon gimmicks including conversion between sword and rifle forms have been faithfully recreated

title: RG 1/144 Johnny Ridden's MS-06R-2 Zaku II High Mobility Type
product_description:
RG 1/144 Johnny Ridden's MS-06R-2 Zaku II High Mobility Type
Johnny Ridden's Zaku II joins the RG line up as the first RG from the Mobile Suit Gundam MSV line and the first ever High Mobility Type Zaku as well. Its unique leg thrusters and backpack have been made with newly designed parts based on Kunio Okawara's illustrations including the 4 nozzle type bell vernier.  Includes two shades of red on different parts of armor and stickers to recreate the markings on the Johnny Ridden Custom.  Weapons include Giant Bazooka, Zaku Machine Gun, Heat Hawk, and regular bazooka along with numerous hand display options.  Runner x 14, realistic decal, springs for energy pipes, instruction manual.
Product size: Approx 5 in
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0tb0fpapB9Q/WeqK6ASNDnI/AAAAAAAGyIc/vpKuuuwxlx0SjpMToytwJR2dTU_PohI7wCLcBGAs/s1600/rg-johnny-ridden%2527s-zaku-II.JPG

title: RG 1/144 Sinanju
product_description:
RG 1/144 Sinanju
"Gundam Unicorn" have been waiting a long time for this one!  The Sinanju finally gets a Real Grade kit and wow is it detailed.  The emblem parts are golden-plated for superior detail and the red parts feature a smooth glossy finish for extra impact! All parts come molded in multiple colors with stickers provided to add extra colors and markings.  

Full Frontal's deep red mobile suit Sinanju from Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn RE:0096 comes to RG!
The flexible thrusters on its back feature new, realistically-reengineered thrusters, and hatches can be opened to show off its internal mechanisms.
Its golden engraving is plated, and the red armor uses gloss injection, each for a beautifully shining surface.
And of course, the entire design is refined and up-detailed by Hajime Katoki!
https://www.gundam.my/images/sell_products/interactive/3150/3.jpg

title: RG XXXG-01W WING GUNDAM EW VER.
product_description:
RG XXXG-01W WING GUNDAM EW VER.

Adopted the inner frame system "The Advanced MS Joint".
Inner frames and outer armor move relative to each other, just like real human.
The finely color-coded parts can express the shades without painting.
Includes various marking stickers.
Includes a beam rifle, beam sabers and a shield.

title: RG 1/144 MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame
product_description:
Adopted the inner frame system "The Advanced MS Joint".
Inner frames and outer armor move relative to each other, just like real human.
The finely color-coded parts can express the shades without painting.
Luster of metal can be expressed with realistic decals.
Includes various marking stickers.
The Japanese sword "Gerbera Straight", is silver color plated. The pattern on the blade is also reproduced.
Includes a beam rifle, beam sabers and a shield.
Runner x9, Realistic decal x1, Instruction manual x1

title: RG 1/144 00 Raiser
product_description:
RG 1/144 00 Raiser

The "Advanced MS Joint" is adopted.
The Luster of metal, which is hard to get with paint, is produced with the realistic decals. The glitter of the inner side of the GN Condenser is re-created with them.
0 Raiser has movable functions on the body, such as a slide mechanism of the wings. That makes it possible to re-create the combination with 00 Gundam.
The movable structure for circular movement is adopted to re-create the cloak-and-sword action.
The GN Drive is detachable. The particle storage tank can be re-created.
Includes various marking stickers.
Runner x12, Realistic decal x1, Instruction manual x1

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion RG EVA Unit-02
product_description:
Evangelion Unit 02 gets a new RG Evangelion Series model kit from Bandai! It features a wide range of motion after assembly, with particular attention paid to ensuring the armor parts don't interfere with posability. The head is molded in multiple small colored parts, to reproduce its complex color combinations without painting; its eyes are clear parts, too. The progressive knife is a new version, and the thunder spear can fold, too; plenty of interchangeable hands (15 in total!) are provided as well. Order it for your own collection now!

[Includes]:

Pallet rifle
Thunder spear
Progressive knife (x2)
Umbilical cable
Realistic decals
Interchangeable hands (x15)



﻿Estimated arrival September/October 2020
RG Eva Unit 02
This is an injection-plastic kit of a science-fiction/anime item.

The progressive knife is a new version, and the thunder spear can fold, too; plenty of interchangeable hands (15 in total!) are provided as well. Order it for your own collection now!

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion RG EVA Unit-00
product_description:
RG General humanoid decisive battle weapon Android Evangelion prototype No. 0
From the RG Evangelion series, which pursues realism as an android, a prototype zero is available!-The second in pursuit of the action pose reproduction of Evangelion with RG.■ Movement of the spine and shoulder blades, interlocking of each armor, gimmick that armor follows when adding a twist to the arm, etc., further consider and express the Evangelion Zero Unit as a "real grade".■ You can assemble before and after the renovation with parts selection type.■ The head reproduces color classification by fine parts division.■ Equipment that appeared in "Evangelion: 1.0 You Can Assemble" can also be selected.■ 7 types of left and right hand parts, 1 type of umbilical cable, 2 types of progressive knife, 1 type of pallet rifle are also included.[Accessories]■ Parts after repair x 1 formula■ Progressive knife × 2 types (normal and storage)■ Pallet rifle × 1■ Hand parts (left and right) × 7 types each■ Umbilical cable × 1

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion RG EVA Unit-00 DX Positron Gun Set
product_description:
RG general humanoid decisive weapon Android Evangelion prototype No.0 DX positron gun set 
From the RG Evangelion series, which pursues realism as an android, a prototype zero is available!-The second in pursuit of the action pose reproduction of Evangelion with RG. The movement of the spine and shoulder blades, the interlocking of each armor, the gimmick that the armor follows when a twist is added to the arm, etc., further considered and expressed the Evangelion Zero as a "real grade".■ You can assemble before and after the renovation with parts selection type.■ The head reproduces color classification by fine parts division.■ Equipment that appeared in "Evangelion: 1.0 You Can Assemble" can also be selected.■ Strongly linked with the first RG Evangelion! Includes Operation Yashima reproduction parts "G-type equipment" and "Positron rifle".■ 7 types of left and right hand parts, 1 type of umbilical cable, 2 types of progressive knife, 1 type of pallet rifle are also included.[Accessories]■ Positron rifle × 1 ■ G-type equipment for the first machine × 1■ Refurbished parts × 1 formula■ Progressive knife × 2 types (normal time, storage)■ Pallet rifle × 1■ Hand parts (left and right) × 7 types each■ Umbilical cable × 1

title: RG 1/144 FORCE IMPULSE GUNDAM
product_description:
Shin Asuka's Force Impulse Gundam, seen in the first half of "Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny," gets a new Real Grade kit from Bandai! It features an internal body frame that can be separated from the runners already assembled, meaning much less work for you to do, and amazingly precise details as well! It's molded in color for a screen-accurate appearance. The Force Silhouette's gimmicks, texture and details are carefully reproduced, complete with the wings that fold backwards. The forearm can twist on a separate axis from the elbow for a realistic range of motion, and the shoulder armor rotates independently, reducing part interference. The knee armor is also movable in conjunction with the motion of the leg; four pairs of hands are included, as are plenty of weapons. Place your order today and add this legendary Gundam to your lineup!
[Includes]:

High energy beam rifle
Mobile shield
Vajra beam saber (x2)
Folding razor vs. armored knife (x2)
Silhouette Flyer
Interchangeable hands (x8--4 each left and right)
Realistic decals

RG 1/144 FORCE IMPULSE GUNDAM

 
DESCRIPTION

This is a posable, Real-Grade injection-plastic kit of an item from the Gundam universe.

Shin Asuka's Force Impulse Gundam, seen in the first half of "Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny," gets a new Real Grade kit from Bandai! It features an internal body frame that can be separated from the runners already assembled, meaning much less work for you to do, and amazingly precise details as well! It's molded in color for a screen-accurate appearance. The Force Silhouette's gimmicks, texture and details are carefully reproduced, complete with the wings that fold backwards. The forearm can twist on a separate axis from the elbow for a realistic range of motion, and the shoulder armor rotates independently, reducing part interference. The knee armor is also movable in conjunction with the motion of the leg; four pairs of hands are included, as are plenty of weapons. Place your order today and add this legendary Gundam to your lineup!
[Includes]:

title: RG General-purpose human-type decisive battle weapon Evangelion first machine DX transport stand set
product_description:
RG General-purpose human-type decisive battle weapon Evangelion first machine DX transport stand set
A new frontier of the Real Grade series begins with the introduction of the Multipurpose Humanoid Decisive Weapon, Artificial Human Evangelion. The first release is the iconic EVA Unit-01 from the "Rebuild of Evangelion" movies. True to the mission of the Real Grade line to make these larger than life characters "real", the RG Evangelion features intricate linked parts construction to represent the relaxation and contraction of muscle fibers resulting in a very close emulation of human-joints. The movement of the spine and shoulder blades are linked to the armor parts and follow the movement of the arms and chest, shifting as needed to prevent parts from obstructing each other. From this, realistic humanoid crouching and running poses can be re-created for EVA Unit-01. This version includes a recreation of the transport platform that launches the Eva units as well as special AT Field penetration hand parts and PET effect for AT Field. Includes Entry Plug, Pallet Rifle, 2 Progressive Knives, Umbilical Cable, and 7 types of hands in different expressions.
https://bandai-hobby.net/temp/o_1doijv7v81oof1i02h51cgcm637.jpg

title: Νu Gundam Fin Funnel Effect Set "Char's Counterattack", Bandai Spirits RG 1/144
product_description:
Νu Gundam Fin Funnel Effect Set "Char's Counterattack", Bandai Spirits RG 1/144
A deluxe set featuring the RG Nu Gundam, an Action Base 5, and Jet Effect parts bundled into one package!  This set allows display and deployment of all 6 of Nu Gundam’s funnels and can also be used with the RG Sazabi!  Includes 2 more stand arms when compared to buying each component separately!

title: #32 Nu Gundam "Char's Counterattack", Bandai RG 1/144
product_description:
RG Nu Gundam 1/144 Bandai

 
Amuro Ray's NU Gundam gets an RG kit release from Bandai! Its distinctive colors are carefully reproduced, including three shades of light gray to increase the visual depth. The shoulder and abdomen joints are fully flexible to give it increased posability, and the shoulder armor can also flex with more dynamic posing. The leg armor can slide with the movement of each joint, too. It's fully armed with its beam rifle, hyper bazooka, missiles and more -- order it today!
[Includes]:

Beam rifle
Fin funnel (x6)
New hyper bazooka 
Shield (beam cannon)
Beam saber (backpack & arm) (x2 -- 1 each)
Missiles (1 set)

title: RG OZ-00MS TALLGEESE EW VER TITANIUM FINISH $99.95
product_description:
RG OZ-00MS TALLGEESE EW VER TITANIUM FINISH
The Tallgeese and Wing Gundam Zero Custom real grade kits are being re-released in glorious titanium finish models! All the accessories in this one remain the same as the original, except water transfer decals with updated colors have been included this time to match the incredibly metallic finish!

title: RG Full Armor Unicorn Gundam
product_description:
RG Full Armor Unicorn Gundam


The Real Grade Full Armor Unicorn Gundam is armed to the teeth with its Beam Magnum, two Hyper Bazookas, Beam Javelin, and much more, including the pair of massive propellant tanks attached to its backpack! It snaps together for ease of assembly, and is molded in color so painting isn't necessary, although you could certainly add some paintwork to make it really stand out on your shelf. Order yours today!
[Includes]:

Beam Magnum
Hyper Bazooka (x2)
Beam Javelin
Hand Grenade (x8)
Grenade Launcher (x2)
Beam Gatling Gun (x6)
Base for propellant tanks (x2)
Beam Saber (x2)
Shield (x3)
